description: a(n) = prime(n)*...*prime(m), the least product of consecutive primes which is abundant.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {p = prime(n); sig = p+1; prd = p; while (sig <= 2*prd, p = nextprime(p+1); sig *= p+1; prd *= p;); return (prd);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 10 2013
author: _Walter Nissen_
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Nov 10 2005
